page.title: 02Farming-Imberhorne Farm 1
page.content: { Imberhorne Farm}is an{arable farm}to the west of East Grinstead.The farmer, Mr.Emmett owns five large fields and two small fields which makes a total of about{280 acres.} Some of the machinery on the farm is used all the year round like the tractor which is a very strong machine. The combine harvester is used to cut the corn and harvest it.Usually 2.5 tonnes per acre or 7000 kilograms per hectare is harvested. Due to the weather this year Mr. Emmett's harvest has not been as good as most years. The corn is thin instead of fat and he will not be able to sell so much grain. The corn is kept in a kind of storage shed. The containers in which he keeps the grain are over 3 metres deep and air is blown through to keep the corn in good condition.
